mapper.insert: INSERT INTO itemtable(itemnum, smallcatenum, itemname, itemthumnail, itemdetail, itemunit, itemorigin, itemvolume, itemallergyinfo, itemcost, itemprice, itemdate, itemsupplier ) VALUES (sequence_itemnum.nextval, 3,'순두부','ㅁㄴㅇㄹ' , #{itemDetail}, 'ㅁㄴㅇ', 'asd', 'asd', 'asd', 1, 1, sysdate,'asd')
